summary: This is a small fix if you are using Jaxsonz Smart Looter continued and also using Havok Breast Physics. This will prevent your inventory filling up with useless Havok Coins.  I made this attempt at a fix for myself and decided to share since both the original author and current author of Jaxaonz Smart Looter do not seem to have moved on.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700][b]UPDATE 01/19/2018: [/b]I have added a fomod installer that should be compatible with NMM and MO.  If you already installed this mod, manually, you do not need this update. But if you are new to this mod, the installer will give you three options.  It will let you choose if you have both FNIS Sexy Move and Bounce and Jiggles installed or just one of those two. Simply download with NMM and run the install.

[/color][color=#00ff00]If this mod has helped you, please give it an endorsement, as I am new and will take that as encouragement to make more mods.  I have a few interesting ideas in my brain case I want to try out. Regardless, enjoy.[/color]

This would be my first attempt at a mod.  But, it is simple and this only adds an item to a formlist included in another mod.  I found that the Never Loot Function was not working for me thru the MCM menu.  So this adds the item to the formlist with no in-game effort of my own. I have added two additional versions.  One version prevents FNIS Sexy Move Coins from being looted.  The other prevents both FNIS Sexy Move Coins and Havok Coins from being looted. These files are not compatible with each other.  You can only choose one. *Please note, this will not remove coins already in your inventory.

JSL Havok Coin Loot Fix requires the following

[list]
[*][color=#616161][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66998?tab=description]Jaxonz Smart Looter Continued v 5.02[/url]﻿[/b][/color]
[*][b][color=#616161][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044]Bounce and Jiggles 7.8b - HDT Havok Collisions Object[/url]﻿ The link says 7.8b, but the download was 7.7b[/color][/b]
[/list]
JSL FNIS Sexy Move Coin Loot Fix requires the following

[list]
[*][color=#616161][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66998?tab=description]Jaxonz Smart Looter Continued v 5.02[/url]﻿[/b][/color]
[*][color=#616161][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54521]FNIS Sexy Move 7.1[/url]﻿[/b][/color]
[/list]
JSL FNIS Sexy Havok Coin Loot Fix requires the following [color=#666666][b]I like the sound of that, Sexy Havok.[/b][/color]

[list]
[*][color=#616161][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66998?tab=description]Jaxonz Smart Looter Continued v 5.02[/url]﻿[/b][/color]
[*][b][color=#616161][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044]Bounce and Jiggles 7.8b - HDT Havok Collisions Object[/url]﻿ The link says 7.8b, but the download was 7.7b[/color][/b]
[*][color=#616161][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54521]FNIS Sexy Move 7.1[/url]﻿[/b][/color]
[/list]
I will be working on an all in one installer this weekend if you prefer that method of installation.

[color=#ff7700]Note: You will not see anything in your Jaxonz Smart Looter Do Not Loot inventory. [/color][color=#ffffff]
I will be adding additional fixes related to Jaxonz Smart Looter continued and other mods I use in the near future.  If you encounter any issues, please leave a comment with as much detail as possible.  I will make an effort to solve issues related to this mod.

Disclaimer: I have not tested this mod against any other version for compatibility. This mod is not adult in nature, but one of the mods linked can be considered to be a skimpy mod since it attempts to add realistic physics to the female breast.

[/color]
author: crc64error

files.name: JSL Havok Coin Loot Fix
